channel.title: Lattices on EduGovNet.com
channel.description: Recent content in Lattices on EduGovNet.com

item.title: Zassenhaus Lemma and the Jordan Holder Theorem
item.description: This entry starts out by building to Zassenhaus' Lemma, and finishes by proving the Jordan-Holder theorem about subnormal sequences for finite groups. Enjoy!

item.title: Parial Orders Lattices and Some Subgroups
item.description: In this article we mostly talk about partial orders, and lattices, which are a special type of partial order. We tie it in with our discussions of subgroups before proving two distribution laws for lattices.
